ref.mixed-citation: Troeger, C., Blacker, B., Khalil, I.A. & G.B.D. 2016 Lower Respiratory Infections Collaborators Estimates of the global, regional, and national morbidity, mortality, and aetiologies of lower respiratory infections in 195 countries, 1990–2016: a systematic analysis for the Global Burden of Disease Study 2016. Lancet Infect Dis. 18, 1191–1210 (2018).
